headline: Mastercard SpendingPulse: US Black Friday Retail Sales Up +3.4% vs. Last Year
summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., November 30, 2024--According to preliminary insights from Mastercard SpendingPulse™, U.S. retail sales excluding automotive were up +3.4% on Black Friday, November 29 compared to Black Friday 2023. Mastercard SpendingPulse measures in-store and online retail sales, representing all payment types, and is not adjusted for inflation.
